overview: Exclusive to - THE ONE - limited "Babymetal World Tour 2014 Apocalypse"  Box Set, this Blu-Ray contains Babymetal's live performance held at "Makuhari Messe" on September 14th, 2014 as well as tour highlights from visited countries on their 2014 World Tour.
title: BABYMETAL - World Tour 2014 - Apocalypse
